text.html: The above video for a campaign to re-launch the company after having closed it's doors for almost a year. It was the last piece ever done in the iconic 'Factory', and utilises a combination of full bleed footage, cut between dynamic crop's against a black background to create a graphical rhythm, that was easily adaptable to the constraints of different film lengths, and formats.
